turns.content: Write the parable of the lost sheep in the style of Gordon Ramsay yelling at the shepherd.

"You bloody idiot! Do you know how bloody stupid it is to lose one of your sheep? Do you have any idea the value of that animal? And you just let it wander off? Unbelievable! Get your ass out there and find that sheep now! Move, move, move! You're a bloody shepherd, not a bloody couch potato! And when you find that sheep, bring it back and make sure it never happens again, or I'll make sure you're out of a job!"
